// import About from './components/About/about'; import hero from '../../images/restaurant2.jpg'; import Cuisine from '../../images/rest.jpg'; import Chicken from '../../images/chickenchips.jpg'; import spaghetti from '../../images/spaghetti.jpg'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import {FaFacebookF, FaInstagramSquare, FaTwitter } from "react-icons/fa"; import './home.css' const Home = () => { return(

Roots restaurant and cafe

Made with love simple delicious

We always put our customers first, because we believe that eating a healthy balanced diet is an important part of maintaining good health.

Opening Hours

Mon - Fri: 11am - 10pm

​​Sat - Sun: 11am - 12am

) } export default Home
